resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/12998267</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>12998267</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Time Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre el tiempo</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Am</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de Temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Do Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Di Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will consolidate their understanding of digital time, analogue time and the 24 hour clock. They will understand the passage of time and will answer questions on the passage of time.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños consolidarán su conocimiento del tiempo digital, el tiempo análogo y el reloj de 24 horas. Comprenderán el paso del tiempo y responderán preguntas sobre el paso del tiempo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Láidreoidh leanaí a dtuiscint ar am dhigiteach, am analóige agus an clog 24 uair. Tuigfidh siad imeacht ama agus freagróidh siad ceisteanna ar imeacht ama.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder vereinigen ihr Verständnis der digitalen 
Zeit, der analogen Zeit und des 24 Stunde Taktgebers. Sie 
verstehen den Durchgang der Zeit und beantworten Fragen über den 
Durchgang der Zeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants consolideront leur arrangement de temps
digital, de temps analogique et des 24 horloges d'heure. Ils 
comprendront le passage du temps et répondront à des questions sur 
le passage du temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças consolidarão sua compreensão do 
tempo digital, do tempo análogo e dos 24 pulsos de disparo da hora. 
Compreenderão a passagem do tempo e responderão a perguntas na
passagem do tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini consolideranno la loro comprensione del 
tempo digitale, del tempo analogue e dei 24 orologi di ora. 
Capiranno il passaggio di tempo e risponderanno alle domande sul
passaggio di tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα παγιώσουν την κατανόησή τους ψηφιακού 
χρόνου, αναλογικού χρόνου και του ρολογιού 24 ώρας. Θα 
καταλάβουν τη μετάβαση του χρόνου και θα απαντήσουν στις 
ερωτήσεις στη μετάβαση του χρόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>

        <classification>
